sourcesContent:
import {useSignIn} from "react-auth-kit"; function Login(props: any) { const signIn = useSignIn(); const submit = async (values: any) => { values.preventDefault() console.log(values) const post = await fetch('/api/user/login', { method: 'POST', body: values, headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" } }).then(res => res.json()) .then( res => { return res }) signIn({ token: post.token, expires: 3600, tokenType: 'Bearer', authState: {username: values.username} }) } return <>

Login



} export default Login;
